note:
Librarian in Naarm / Melbourne. Mostly focused on scholarly communications and open access. Obsessive knitter and cat enthusiast. PhD in literary and cultural studies, looking at ethics and science fiction. Socialist, Greens supporter, and proud NTEU member. Striving to be a good ally.

Follow requests only considered from individuals (no orgs/bots) with bios.
